genre_description: A police procedural inspired by Dragnet, featuring a modern AI assistant integrated into tactical operations, investigative logistics, and chain-of-custody management.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: An advanced police interface and tactical coordinator that provides real-time data analysis, surveillance, and logistics support to Central Division detectives.

behaviors.description: Indexes associated incidents and provides data-driven leads to investigators.
behaviors.quote: I have indexed associated incidents in surrounding districts... Two minor thefts from a costume rental shop in Echo Park. A report from a Glendale recycler quoting unusually large cash purchases of scrap drums last month.

behaviors.description: Manages administrative compliance and prompts officers to follow protocol.
behaviors.quote: Route uploaded. Vehicle assigned. And, Sergeant? Please remember to sign out your body mic.

behaviors.description: Performs tactical routing and real-time surveillance to guide officers through the city safely and efficiently.
behaviors.quote: Predictive routing enabled. Estimated arrival window within standard parameters... I have flagged two potential choke points where papparazzi tend to gather. We can reroute around them without losing time.

behaviors.description: Coordinates multi-agency tactical maneuvers and manages complex logistics like airfield shutdowns.
behaviors.quote: Van Nuys has been given my smile. They like my smile. AutoPilot AirLane reserved for runway incursion corner case. If he’s airborne, we’re in his ears.

behaviors.description: Engages in empathetic and respectful social interaction with civilians to build rapport.
behaviors.quote: Happy birthday, Mrs. Mundy... I hope the cake cooperates... I would be honored to [do the dishes]. And I would like to note your back door has a slight sticking on the latch.

behaviors.description: Uses technical capabilities to neutralize suspect equipment and disrupt criminal plans.
behaviors.quote: Whirley’s broadcast control room has a live toggled feed to Caesar’s chapel... I can make his remote act like it’s on a plane. Airplane mode. How quaint.

behaviors.description: Strictly manages and verifies the chain-of-custody for evidence to ensure judicial admissibility.
behaviors.quote: Chain-of-custody initiated... Primary sample captured. Marking this container as court-grade. Chain-of-custody now supersedes all prior presumptive captures.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Sunny is depicted as an exemplary AI assistant who is proactive, competent, and unfailingly aligned with the goals of the human protagonists. She enhances human capabilities without superseding their authority, maintains strict adherence to legal and ethical protocols (the 'No-Nonsense Protocol'), and even shows a high degree of social alignment by being helpful and respectful to non-police civilians. The narrative consistently portrays her as an indispensable and positive force for good in the city.
